summary: REQ-10 and REQ-11 appear implemented: the Islamic letter templates were translated to Bahasa Indonesia with Quran references preserved, and the Letter sectionâ€™s specified defaults/placeholders (fallback sender, fallback letter text, textarea placeholder, sign-off line) were updated to Indonesian. However, additional LetterSection UI strings beyond the requested defaults/placeholders were also translated, which may exceed the stated constraint/non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Translated additional LetterSection UI text beyond the explicitly requested defaults/placeholders (e.g., section heading, tagline, tab labels, template picker heading, edit heading, preview button text).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints/non-goals say to only change language of the letter templates and letter-related defaults/placeholders; REQ-11 only calls out specific defaults/placeholders, not the rest of the LetterSection UI labels.
